title: Thomas Rhett and Lauren Akins celebrate their seven year wedding anniversary
text:
Country music star Thomas Rhett celebrated his seven year wedding anniversary with wife Lauren Akins on Saturday.

The 29 year old singer and his 29 year old wife both took to Instagram to share photos and heartfelt messages about their relationship.

The happily married couple had both known each other since they were in the second grade, having grown up together.

Happy Anniversary: Country music star Thomas Rhett celebrated his seven year wedding anniversary with wife Lauren Akins on Saturday

'I can’t believe the Lord has blessed me with 7 amazing years of marriage with @lauren_akins,' Rhett began, in the caption of an Instagram photo where they're both fly fishing.

'It’s tough to put into words how crazy the ride has been. We have changed and grown In so many ways and I literally find new ways to love you every single day,' he added.

'There is no one in the world like you babe. You are the most amazing mother to our kids and you treat me way too good,' Rhett added.

Fly fishing: 'I can’t believe the Lord has blessed me with 7 amazing years of marriage with @lauren_akins,' Rhett began, in the caption of an Instagram photo where they're both fly fishing

'I hope this picture is a glimpse into us getting old together. I love you honey,' he concluded.

He added another photo with the singer hugging his wife backstage, offering more sentiments about Akins.

'I lied. This one right here just about sums it up. Thanks so much babe for being my rock and for loving me so good. You are my favorite person on the planet. Now im gonna quit posting for a month. Peace!!!

Sums it up: He added another photo with the singer hugging his wife backstage, offering more sentiments about Akins

Akins added her own sentiments in an Instagram post of her own, along with a photo from their joyous wedding.

'Happy wedding anniversary 7 years ago tonight honey,' Akins began, adding a gold heart emoji.

'You are better than my best dream and so is our life with our precious babies,' she added, referring to their daughters Willa Grey and Ada James.

'I’m so thankful God gave me you:) can’t wait for the next 70 babe y+m I love you Thomas Rhett,' she concluded.

The couple married on October 12, 2012, with the couple adopting Willa Grey from Uganda in May 2017 and their daughter Ada James born in August 2017.

The couple announced in July that they were expecting their third child.
